title: 103_hr3780
content: The Act titled "Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994" aims to privatize the Federal Power Marketing Administrations. The Act "Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994" aims to privatize the power generation and transmission facilities of the Federal Power Marketing Administrations and transfer remaining property to other agencies in an orderly manner. The President is required to develop a plan for selling these facilities to the private sector in groupings to introduce competition in the electric power market. The Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994 aims to privatize power generation and transmission facilities, transfer remaining property to other agencies, and reduce national debt through sales. The President must develop a plan for selling real property, facilities, and equipment by September 30, 1994. The Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994 aims to transfer power facilities and equipment to public and private entities through sales. The plan developed by the President includes recommendations for the sale of power generation and transmission facilities to maximize proceeds. The Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994 aims to transfer power facilities to public and private entities through sales. Former customers will continue to be served, and reliability of service will be ensured by establishing control areas. Transfers may group facilities using different power sources and provide access to transmission grids to ensure power availability from various sources. The Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994 aims to transfer power facilities to public and private entities through sales. This includes transferring jurisdictional authority over real property and certain functions to appropriate governmental departments and agencies. All outstanding loans associated with the facilities and equipment will be assumed by the purchasers. The Federal Power Marketing Administrations Privatization Act of 1994 aims to transfer power facilities through sales. The plan includes a step-by-step procedure, timetable, estimated net proceeds, and implementation costs.
